block.p: PINE-Arthur. On October 26, 2000. Of Manhasset, NY. Beloved husband of Harriette. Dear father of David (Dale) and Richard (Nancy) Adored grandfather of Ross, Alec, Adam and Gideon. Brother of Martin. Services Sunday, 12 noon at Sunset Chapels, 1285 Northern Blvd, Manhasset, LI. In lieu of flowers donations to The Service Guild of Long Island Jewish Hospital are appreciated.
PINE-Arthur. Our deepest sympathy to the Pine Family on the passing of their beloved father and husband. The Service Guild, L.I. Jewish Medical Center
